entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gods Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -34.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Island Lake Airport 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -34.7°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -38.1°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
